name: mobx-model
description: Simple model with attributes and relations updated from json

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && rm -rf _book && gitbook build -g wearevolt/mobx-model
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:wearevolt/mobx-model gh-pages --force

author: Alexander Ponomarev
